channel.title: RuneTech
channel.description:
[center]Hello Moparscape, Everyone who like the old, but not classic RuneScape, feel free to take a look at this topic! The RuneTech Staff offers an amazing playtime on their server, don't miss the chance, join today! We still looking for staff, feel free to apply! If the position that you want is full, you still have chance to become staff in the future, don't be sad!;) (Don't forget that the server still very new, but they working on everything. Please do not complain, just suggest your ideas!)
[url=http://www.rune-tech.com/]Website[/url] and [url=http://runetech.boards.net/]Forum[/url]
[u][b]Play[/b][/u] [url=http://www.rune-tech.com/194647502]Webclient[/url] || [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/j5z7rnf6ccznj63/RuneTech%20Client.rar]Download Client[/url]
- this server has hunter added, working - a lot of nice bosses - active and friendly staff, a lot of work put into the server - a lot of new updates will come soon and will be made - we still need staff (apply for the rank) - active staff (important for the server to run correctly) - i hope u guys have fun on here. its a brand new server and we - open 24/7 - more will be added soon thank u, Rune-tech Staff members
[B][U]Media[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i1288.photobucket.com/albums/b491/PremonitionFounderOfResistance/home_zps7d32d056.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1288.photobucket.com/albums/b491/PremonitionFounderOfResistance/minigamescurses_zpsd763d46f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1288.photobucket.com/albums/b491/PremonitionFounderOfResistance/hunterandagility_zps8f5b6459.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1288.photobucket.com/albums/b491/PremonitionFounderOfResistance/godwars_zps96fae93e.png[/img]
Thanks for reading, join today!:)[/center]

item.title: RuneTech
item.dc:creator: @hardcore_pk hardcore pk
item.description:
@hardcore_pk wrote:

[quote=“JoesServers, post:7, topic:514688”]“Hardcore Pk” thats a loveing brilliant name init - go troll somewhere else you mug - bet you didnt have 27 players join in the first day of hosting. theres nothing wrong with the name RuneTech what so ever, people enjoy the server.

jealous people - i hope this server contiues to go good and i also hope we can get more and more of you LOYAL players - not trollers like you mr hardcore pk - (brilliant name too you mug)[/quote]

i gave you TIP and wished good luck! and this what i get? server name is represents much. would you like to join babyborn world?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneTech
item.dc:creator: @Premonition Premonition
item.description:
@Premonition wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:12, topic:514688”][quote author=Premonition link=topic=632937.msg4278585#msg4278585 date=1365251107]

I’ve removed your other advertisement as this one is better. We don’t allow multiple advertisements in this section, so if I see anymore then I’ll have to remove your posting privileges from the section.

Well, the other created by Joe (The Owner). He just said we need players, so I thought here I can advertise. I don’t asked if anyone else already posted it here, sorry.
[/quote]there is a search bar in the top right you could had easily searched the name first
You should had also read the rules first at any rate.[/quote]

I don’t thought there is already a topic. Of course I will search next time.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneTech
item.dc:creator: @Premonition Premonition
item.description:
@Premonition wrote:

Soulcist:

Even still, the server (with now media) looks boring and like nothing new has been added - do something unique.

Personally I play on a 317 server which full of friendly people, instead playing on a 719 which full of retards…^^ The server is only created a few days ago, and the owner, co-owners are working on the bugs and every other thing. Maybe boring now, but there is no play no-lifer kids who crying for everything. We have some amazing people, who make this server more unique than any other.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Premonition Premonition
item.description:
@Premonition wrote:

hardcore pk:

runetech? try name what makes people join! good luck with runetech.

The peoples not join cause the name. They want the features, because that what make a server better than others.

I’ll add pictures now, enjoy!

item.title: RuneTech
item.dc:creator: @Premonition Premonition
item.description:
@Premonition wrote:

Soulcist:

Those forums look EXTREMELY awful, and the main website should be a lot better. Either way, there isn’t much of an attraction here considering there is no media (I saw the message, but how soon is in your book?) and that should be added with the advertisement to make a continuous flow of advertisement.

Yesterday was a mad day, there was a few problems and changes, and there will be more… I will add media today, and of course the forum will be changed soon, as the website too. The server is only up since a few day, there is need more time, and fix some bugs before I post some pics… Anyways, this server is not a simple server that full of trolls and kids, there is massive team work, and we’re work on make this server better as much as we can.

Read full topic
